info.title: SPSV
info.author: meesterP
info.description: Displays playtime of all installed apps
info.details: This is a Switch Application that shows a selected users play statistics, currently just the playtime, for all installed applications.\nCompatible with HOS 16 (see GitHub for compatability with older versions).

changelog: v4\nAdded icon to NRO\nCompiled with libnx 4.9.0
